name: Rotating World (source code included)
description:
This is an older project made in Construct 2, but fully compatible with Construct 3.

Features:

  • 2 demo levels (fixed camera and moving camera)
  • Onscreen touch controls
  • Simple jump and run game
  • Rotate the level 90° left or right at any time
  • Source code included ( . capx)

*the "compass" in top-left side of the screen show the original direction of the ground

⇓ (link to the free assets will be added soon)

Any feedback is welcomed 😉
